alert.note: Alert for Burke; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:51PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Burke, southeastern Richmond, southern Barnwell and southwestern Aiken Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 451 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Aiken Mall to near Hephzibah. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, Waynesboro, Barnwell, Savannah River Site, Plant Vogtle, Hephzibah, New Ellenton, Jackson, Sardis, Midville, Alexander, Burke County Airport, Gough, McBean, Gloverville, Augusta Regional Airport, Burnettown, Snelling, Girard, and Vidette. This includes Interstate 520 in Georgia near mile marker 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Georgia...and central South Carolina.
